summary: The story of Francisco, a very simple and poor man whose dream was to see his children become country music stars, and who made all the efforts to make it happen.
cast: Ângelo Antônio|Dira Paes|Márcio Kieling|Thiago Mendonça|Paloma Duarte|Dablio Moreira|Marcos Henrique|Natália Lage|Wigor Lima|Zezé di Camargo|Luciano Camargo|Jackson Antunes|José Dumont|Lima Duarte|Emanoel Camargo|Maria Lucier Camargo|Marlene José Camargo|Ciça Castello|Francisco José de Camargo|Helena Siqueira de Camargo|Walter José de Camargo|Wellington José de Camargo|Wesley José de Camargo|Katia Delfino|Pedro Leonardo|Leonardo Monteiro de Barros|Thiago|Cid Moreira
keywords: brazilian singer|brazilian musical duos|punctuation in title|ampersand in title|success
title: 2 Filhos de Francisco: A História de Zezé di Camargo & Luciano
